thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I arrived with a nail in my tire and 3 other bald tires . Louis T was able to replace all tires and get me back on the road within an hour. Awesome customer service and he was a pleasure to work with considering my morning got off to a rough start.
